content: ุฃุนูู ุงููุงุชููุงูุ ุงูุงุซูููุ ููุงุฉ ุงูุจุงุจุง ูุฑูุณูุณุ ุนู ุนูุฑ ููุงูุฒ 88 ุนุงูุง ุจุนุฏ ุตุฑุงุน ูุน ุงููุฑุถ. ูุงูุชูู ุงููุงุชููุงู ูู ููุดูุฑ ุนูู ูููุน ุงูุชูุงุตู ุงูุงุฌุชูุงุนู โุฅูุณโุ ุจุงูููู ุฅู ุงูุจุงุจุง ูุฑูุณูุณ ูุฏ ุชููู ูู ููุฑ ุฅูุงูุชู. ูุฌุงุก ุฐูู ุจุนุฏ ููู ูุงุญุฏ ููุท ูู ุธููุฑู ุจุนุฏ ุบูุงุจ ุทููู ุจุณุจุจ ุงููุฑุถ ูู ุณุงุญุฉ ุงููุฏูุณ ุจุทุฑุณ ุจููุงุณุจุฉ ูุฏุงุณ ุนูุฏ ุงููุตุญ. title: Sidi Mohamed Amar : We Expect Washington Will Respect UN Resolutions
content: The American administration emphasised the need for a solution to the Western Sahara conflict acceptable to both parties, the Polisario Frontโs representative to the United Nations and coordinator with MINURSO, Ambassador Sidi Mohamed Amar, said. This โpresents us with the reality that the Polisario Front and the Sahrawi people categorically reject the so-called Moroccan expansionist proposal, which was stillborn. This means that this proposal can never serve as the basis for any solution, today or tomorrow, because it is rejected in its entirety by the Sahrawi side. It should also not be the basis for a just and lasting solution that guarantees the Sahrawisโ right to self-determination, as affirmed by UN Security Council resolutions, including the recent  resolution 2756 .โ He added in an interview with  Echorouk  regarding the briefing recently delivered by the UN Secretary-Generalโs Personal Envoy, Staffan de Mistura, to members of the Security Council, that โit presented the outcome of his consultations and contacts with both parties to the conflictโthe Popular Front for the Liberation of Saguia el-Hamra and Rio de Oroโand the Moroccan occupation state, during his recent tour of the region, in addition to his contacts with some other parties, including the new US administrationโ. Therefore, โeverything De Mistura presented regarding the new US administrationโs confirmation of the position it adopted in December 2021 is a presentation of this position and does not imply any endorsement either by him or the Secretary-General of the so-called Moroccan expansionist proposal.โ Regarding the remarks of the US Presidentโs Advisor for African and Middle Eastern Affairs, Massad Boulos, who announced his readiness to visit the region, Sahrawi Ambassador Sidi Mohamed Amar explained, โWe in the Polisario Front place more importance on actions than words.โ He added that what the Polisario Front expects from the United States, in brief, are two issues. The first concerns the implementation and respect of the letter and spirit of the United Nations resolutions, including the decision of the General Assembly, which considers the  Western Sahara issue a matter of decolonisation , and Security Council resolutions, which address the issue as a matter of international peace and security. The second is that it be faithful to the letter and spirit of its constitution, which, as we know, is based on affirming the sovereignty of peoples and their freedom of choice. This constitution begins with the phrase โWe the people of the United States,โ a phrase that was quoted in the wording of the UN Charter itself, which begins with the words โWe the peoples of the United Nations.โ โTherefore, what we demand is that it be faithful to the letter and spirit of its constitution, which affirms the sovereignty of peoples and their freedom of choice. This means, concerning the Western Sahara issue, supporting a peaceful and just solution that respects the will of the Sahrawi people and their inalienable right to self-determination and independence,โ he added. The  Polisario Front  representative stressed that โsupporting any solution, whatever its type, that does not respect, ignores, or attempts to distort the legal nature of the Western Sahara issue will only lead to an escalation of tensions in the region, which will not serve regional and continental peace and security.โ

title: Criminal BHLโs Democracy Will Not Find a Way to the Victorious Algeria
content: According to a press release by the National Observatory for Civil Society, civil society activists condemned hostile remarks and campaigns interfering in Algeriaโs internal affairs and reiterated their unconditional support for state institutions and its foreign policy. Civil society activists denounced the hostile statements against Algeria by the extremist Bernard-Henri Lรฉvy, affirming their unconditional support for the stateโs institutions and foreign policy. In this regard, the Observatory noted that โthe various and diverse civil society organisations, with their associations, unions, student organisations, and mass movements, imbued with the spirit of November, were not surprised by the croaking of the fanatical extremist known as Bernard-Henri Lรฉvy during his media outbursts. He advocated, with his hands stained with the blood of innocents, for the policies and positions of yesterdayโs coloniser, hostile to the land from which he was expelled, along with his fellow colonisers and usurping settlers, who have not comprehended that the land has been returned to its people.โ The Observatoryโs statement indicated that โthe idea of a strong Algeria, with its institutions and civil society, seems to still weigh heavily on the hearts of those accustomed to fishing in troubled waters,โ citing the positions of โthose who are still unable to grasp the new dynamics generated by the awareness of youth and the maturity of institutions.โ He stressed that civil society organisations โreserve the right to pursue legal action against anyone who would dare to interfere in internal affairs or use civil society as a vehicle for their destructive colonialist ideas.โ He also pointed out that โthe memory issue was never a colonial rent. Rather, it is the cause of a nation that believes in the struggle of its ancestors, which did not and will not end with the attainment of independence. Rather, it continues generation after generation against all those who attempt to obscure the crimes of the brutal coloniser, including massacres, holocausts, nuclear tests, and mines planted thousands of kilometres away, and against all those who attempt to sow discord and division between the people and their state institutions.โ Civil society activists concluded that โthe democracy that the criminal Bernard Henri-Lรฉvy exported to some countries, which led their peoples to seas of blood, divisions, and strife for which they are still paying the price, will not find its way to victorious Algeria.โ

title: Marchรฉ noir des rendez-vous de visa: Une enquรชte rรฉclamรฉe
content: Les Algรฉriens font face ร un obstacle majeur, dรจs quโils souhaitent obtenir un rendez-vous de visa pour lโEspagne, et ce en raison de lโindisponibilitรฉ des crรฉneaux chez le prestataire BLS International. Alors que les crรฉneaux sont normalement accessibles et surtout gratuits via la plateforme du prestataire chargรฉ du traitement des dossiers, ces derniers sโavรจrent systรฉmatiquement indisponibles. Pourtant, ces mรชmes rendez-vous sont vendus ร prix dโor via un systรจme parallรจle, notamment via les rรฉseaux sociaux. Une situation qui a suscitรฉ une grogne sociale .Face ร lโampleur des signalements, le dรฉputรฉ Rachid Cherchar a interpellรฉ le gouvernement et appelรฉ ร des mesures concrรจtes. Dans ce contexte, le dรฉputรฉ Rachid Cherchar a adressรฉ une correspondance au ministรจre des Affaires รฉtrangรจres pour dรฉnoncer la vente illรฉgale de ces rendez-vous de visa par desยrรฉseaux de courtage informels. Dans sa dรฉmarche, le dรฉputรฉ Cherchar ne se contente pas de solliciter une enquรชte administrative. Il propose รฉgalement dโancrer cette problรฉmatique dans le cadre juridique en cours de rรฉforme. Concrรจtement, il suggรจre dโinclure cette forme deยยซยspรฉculation numรฉriqueยยปยdans la catรฉgorie des infractions pรฉnales au mรชme titre que la revente illรฉgale de produits de consommation, dans le cadre de la rรฉforme du Code de procรฉdures pรฉnales actuellement en discussion.

title: ONU: Israรซl bloque lโaccรจs ร toute aide humanitaire ร Gaza depuis 50 jours
content: Les Nations unies ont alertรฉ lundi sur une situation humanitaire catastrophique ร Gaza, affirmant quโIsraรซl bloque lโaccรจs ร toute aide depuis 50 jours. Lโorganisation a mis en garde contre des consรฉquences ยซ horribles ยป pour la population civile. Lors dโun point de presse quotidien, le porte-parole de lโONU, Stรฉphane Dujarric, a dรฉclarรฉ que le Bureau des Nations unies pour la coordination des affaires humanitaires (OCHA) nโa pas pu acheminer de nourriture, de carburant, de mรฉdicaments ni aucun autre bien essentiel ร Gaza depuis prรจs de deux mois. ยซ Nous sommes au 50e jour oรน aucune aide humanitaire, de quelque nature que ce soit, nโa pu entrer ร Gaza en raison des restrictions imposรฉes par Israรซl ยป, a-t-il dรฉplorรฉ. Selon Dujarric, les rรฉserves alimentaires sโamenuisent de maniรจre alarmante, les distributions de nourriture ont considรฉrablement diminuรฉ, et les stocks de mรฉdicaments et de vaccins touchent ร leur fin. Il a รฉgalement tirรฉ la sonnette dโalarme sur lโรฉtat du systรจme de santรฉ, quโil a qualifiรฉ de ยซ proche de lโeffondrement ยป, tandis que la famine menace enfants comme adultes. Enfin, il a notรฉ que des centaines de milliers de personnes ont รฉtรฉ dรฉplacรฉes, et les attaques visant les travailleurs humanitaires et le personnel mรฉdical seraient ร nouveau en hausse.

title: Les funรฉrailles du pape Franรงois auront lieu samedi ร 10 heures, selon le Vatican
content: Les funรฉrailles du pape Franรงois auront lieu samedi ร 10 heures, a annoncรฉ ce mardi le Vatican dans un communiquรฉ. โโLe samedi 26 avril 2025 ร 10 heures, premier jour de la neuvaine, sur le parvis de la basilique Saint-Pierre, sera cรฉlรฉbrรฉe la messe des funรฉrailles du pontife romain Franรงoisโโ, indique le communiquรฉ. A la fin de la cรฉlรฉbration, โโle cercueil du pontife romain sera transportรฉ ร la basilique Saint-Pierre, et de lร ร la basilique Sainte-Marie-Majeure, pour lโinhumationโโ, ajoute encore le document. Les cardinaux se sont rรฉunis โ pour la premiรจre fois depuis la mort de Franรงois โ mardi au Vatican, dans la salle du synode, afin de planifier les funรฉrailles et lโenterrement du pape Franรงois, dโorganiser le conclave, qui vise ร รฉlire son successeur, et de prendre dโautres dรฉcisions concernant la gestion de lโEglise catholique. Le Vatican a diffusรฉ ce jour les premiรจres images du pape dans son cercueil ouvert. Le prรฉsident franรงais Emmanuel Macron a annoncรฉ quโil se rendra aux obsรจques du pape Franรงois. โโNous serons aux obsรจques du pape, comme il se doitโโ, a dรฉclarรฉ le chef de lโEtat lors dโun point presse ร La Rรฉunion, oรน il est en dรฉplacement. Le pape Franรงois a succombรฉ ร un accident vasculaire cรฉrรฉbral (AVC) qui a provoquรฉ un coma et une dรฉfaillance cardiocirculatoire irrรฉversible, indique son certificat de dรฉcรจs publiรฉ lundi par le Vatican. Selon ce document, le souverain pontife รขgรฉ de 88 ans souffrait รฉgalement du diabรจte. โโLe dรฉcรจs a รฉtรฉ constatรฉ par รฉlectrocardiogrammeโโ, indique le certificat qui porte la signature du directeur du dรฉpartement de la santรฉ et de lโhygiรจne du Vatican, le professeur Andrea Arcangeli. โโJe certifie que Sa Saintetรฉ Franรงois (Jorge Mario Bergoglio) nรฉ ร Buenos Aires (Argentine) le 17 dรฉcembre 1936, rรฉsident de la Citรฉ du Vatican, citoyen du Vatican, est dรฉcรฉdรฉ ร 7h35 le 21/04/2025 dans son appartement de la rรฉsidence Sainte-Martheโโ, รฉcrit-il. Les causes de la mort sont : โโaccident vasculaire cรฉrรฉbralโโ, โโcomaโโ et โโdรฉfaillance cardiocirculatoire irrรฉversibleโโ, ajoute Andrea Arcangeli. Lundi soir, des milliers de fidรจles ont affluรฉ place Saint-Pierre pour participer ร une cรฉrรฉmonie de priรจres en hommage au pape dรฉfunt. La mort de cet Argentin connu pour son franc-parler, a suscitรฉ une vague dโรฉmotion ร travers le monde en faveur. Les 135 cardinaux รฉlecteurs, dont environ 80% choisis par Franรงois lui-mรชme, auront la lourde tรขche dโรฉlire son successeur.

title: Macron Is A Prisoner Of Contradictionsโฆ This Is The Only Solution To The Crisis
content: The diplomatic crisis between Algeria and Paris had barely subsided before it resurfaced after French authorities arrested an Algerian consular officer in France in an unacceptable manner in the street, which Algeria denounced as a โdisgraceful actionโ in which France did not respect the minimum diplomatic norms and conventions, prompting Algeria to respond to the showy and defamatory arrest by declaring 12 French diplomats โundesirableโ and requesting their departure from the country within 48 hours. France later announced the expulsion of 12 people working in Algerian consulates there. Mr. Nasser Khabat, secretary general of the Dynamic Movement of the Algerian Community in France (MOUDAF), sees this situation as an expression of a deep issue in the thinking of French elites, who still have not fully accepted Algerian independence and are trying to escape the reality by constantly creating issues and tensions. Mr. Khabat told โEchoroukโ that every time tensions rise, a kind of paternalistic, late-colonial paternalism resurfaces, which some French circles, including at the highest level of the state, are keen to nurture. Algeria, on the other hand, is acting steadily and consistently, demanding an equal partnership based on mutual respect and full sovereignty. Therefore, this crisis is also a reaction to the accumulation of negative signals coming from Paris, whether on issues of memory, migration, or security, he said. Mr. Khabat predicts that the crisis between the two countries will continue for a long time โif France does not make a deep review of the way it deals with Algeria.โ โAlgeria is no longer in a position of waiting, but is increasingly asserting its diplomatic independence and adopting firm positions when its interests are compromised. In a multipolar world, Algeria has alternatives, even within Europe and the Mediterranean basin. The stability of Algerian-French relations now depends on Parisโ ability to realize that the time of symbolic hegemony is over and that Algeria no longer accepts an unbalanced or condescending partnership.โ Regarding the Elysee Palace residentโs position on the crisis, Mr. Nasser Khabat said: โMacron is trapped by his own contradictions. On the one hand, he claims that he wants to reconcile memories. On the other hand, he is increasingly succumbing to the pressure of identityist and xenophobic currents in France, which is reflected in the statements of the ministers of Franรงois Bayrouโs government, especially Interior Minister Bruno Retailleau, and right-wing media that seek to increase tensions between the two countries. The far right is now imposing a large part of the political agenda, especially with regard to migration and memory, using hostility to Algeria as fuel for an election campaign or an internal French crisis. The French president appears weak, as he is no longer able to materialize a coherent foreign policy. His management of the relationship with Algeria lacks vision, continuity and political courage.โ As for the role that the Algerian community in France can play in this crisis, the secretary general of MOUDAF says: โThe Algerian community is a major strategic force, as it is firmly rooted in France, but remains linked to Algeria through multiple ties: Cultural, familial, emotional and economic. This community often pays the price for bilateral tensions, but it also has the potential to be a lever for change.โ It is clear that their role will become more important and influential in the coming years, so it is necessary to organize them within an institutionalized Algerian framework, recognize them, and accompany them in their organizing and representation efforts. A strong and recognized diaspora can contribute to rebalancing the balance of power and conveying the Algerian voice within French society itself, he said. On the possibility of some countries playing a mediating role in calming the tension between Algeria and Paris, Mr. Khabat said: โAlgeria has never asked for external mediation, as it has always favored a clear bilateral relationship based on the principles of sovereignty and respect. However, there could be external parties that could play the role of facilitator โ especially Mediterranean countries like Italy, or influential partners like China or Qatar, and the African Union or the Arab League could be a space for dialogue โ if Paris accepts the reality of Algeriaโs regional repositioning.โ โThe real solution to all that has happened and is happening lies in changing Franceโs perception of Algeria, which must abandon its verticality and regain the meaning of state-to-state dialogue.โ
